column5: Hi all,My boy and myself hit the logging roads after school yesterday to try and get some partridge. We ddi not get any but I took our rods and some bait so we could fish too.Fish we did, and my boy put on a shore fishing walleye clinic! Very good feeling to see my boy enjoying his hunting and fishing so much, only a few more years and he will be out with his own buddies, gonna make the most of this time together, pure gold!VIDEOhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hhK1gxzq0S4
Cool video limey.my days with my boys are over.so enjoy it now.lol

Yup, loving every moment and taking nothing for granted, they grow up fast!Quote: Originally Posted by jfaistenoutstandingQuote: Originally Posted by rnnonmtDouble Thumbs UP Simon! Quote: Originally Posted by lasshHeartwarming! Thanks guys, appreciated.
Great video Simon, Jack is already a fishing machine. Thanks for sharing
My pleasure. He is very accomplished for sure and just like his dad he is a lucky boy to be able to do all this outdoors stuff every day if he wants.
